column5: Hello All,  Time to de-winterized the boat, and can't seem to find my owners manual. Does anyone know the appropriate gap space for the spark plugs for a 20HP Johnson from 1988?  Thanks in advance!  Good Fishing,  Justin
Im sure you will get your answer here Justin.  spark plugs
Hey Brian,  Thanks, bud - great looking site and forum for all things boating. I'm sure I'll find the answer in there somewhere...  Good Fishing, Justin
